pages.text: The $(mob)Imp$() is an animal found in the $(thing)Nether$(). It flees when hit and can be bred using $(item)Glowshroom Stew$(). It is also immune to fire.$(p)While its meat is a potential source of food, it is also poisonous, even after being cooked.
$(mob)Imps$() drop $(item)Imp Leather$() on death. It can be crafted into a fire resistant armor, or into mundane $(l:minecraft_cow)$(item)Leather$().
